item.description: 오늘 한 것 SWEA 문제풀이 최소 신장 트리 def prim(a): key = [float('inf')for _ in range(v+1)] pi = [None for _ in range(v+1)] visit = [0 for _ in range(v+1)] key[0] = 0 for _ in range(v+1): min_key =float('inf') start = -1 for i in range(v+1): if key[i] < min_key and not visit[i]: min_key = key[i] start = i visit[start] = 1 for V, W in a[start]: if W < key[V] and not visit[V]: key[V] = W pi[V] = start return sum(key) for t in range(int(input())): v, e = map(int, input().

오늘 한 것 SWEA 문제풀이 최소 신장 트리 def prim(a): key = [float('inf')for _ in range(v+1)] pi = [None for _ in range(v+1)] visit = [0 for _ in range(v+1)] key[0] = 0 for _ in range(v+1): min_key =float('inf') start = -1 for i in range(v+1): if key[i] < min_key and not visit[i]: min_key = key[i] start = i visit[start] = 1 for V, W in a[start]: if W < key[V] and not visit[V]: key[V] = W pi[V] = start return sum(key) for t in range(int(input())): v, e = map(int, input().
